attributes.action: Make law that drivers who when they pass their test display red R plates for one year and with a maximum speed of 50mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is currenly law on the Isle of Man, and it works!

A newly qualified driver is required to display a red R plate for the first year, during which they are restricted to travelling at no more than 50mph.

This shows everyone on the roads that the driver is new passed on their test and to observe caution, it would also would restrict the drivers speed making the roads saver. 

benefits for the government is i guess a fixed penalty of say £50 could be introduced for those failing to comply. The money could be used for good use.
